name: DESO
introduce:
DeSo（Decentralized Social） is a decentralized social blockchain built to scale decentralized social applications to one billion users. People can build social apps on DeSo in the same way they build financial apps on Ethereum. Over 200 apps are built on DeSo now.
Every user's profile is stored on-chain and is solely controlled by the user's private keys, making identity portable between all apps in the DeSo ecosystem.
